newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Winfoong Inv says in group reorganisation.
newsitem.headline: Winfoong Inv says in group reorganisation.

text.p: Winfoong Investment Ltd said its listing would be replaced by Winfoong International Ltd after it became an indirect wholly owned unit of Winfoong International following a group reorganisation.
The company proposes an exchange of one new Winfoong International share for every two company shares held, and one Winfoong International warrant for every two company warrants.
The proposals, which are conditional on shareholders and warrant holders approval, will become effective on November 15, it said.
Winfoong Investment said the reorganisation would improve structural efficiency and allow greater flexibility in diversifying its business activities overseas.
Shares of Winfoong Investment were unchanged at HK$0.39 at midday. -- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6370
